summary.p: This is the third edition of the Śabdakalpadruma lexicon, as published in five parts by the Chowkhamba Sanskrit Series in 1967. Although it is still attributed to Rādhakāntadeva, this edition is greatly enlarged compared to the edition in Bengali script published in 1857. In particular, the entry for śiviḥ is not present in the older edition.
According to a library stamp, these volumes were acquired in 1970. The digital facsimiles were uploaded to the Internet Archive in 2007.

body.p:
duḥkhī, [n] tri, (duḥkham asyāstīti iniḥ |)
duḥkhānvitaḥ | duḥkhitaḥ | yathā, —

lg.l: “duḥkhino 'duḥkhino vāpi prāṇino labdhacakṣuṣaḥ |
ātmavat_ paripaśyanti te yānti paramāṃ gatim ||
tyaktvātmasukhabhogecchāṃ sarvvasattvasukhaiṣiṇaḥ |
bhavanti paraduḥkhena sādhavo nityaduḥkhitāḥ ||”
“lobhād dveṣād bhayād vāpi yas tyajet_ śaraṇāgatam |
brahmahatyāsamaṃ tasya pāpam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ |
śāstreṣu niṣkṛtir dṛṣṭā mahāpātakinām api |
śaraṇāgatahātus tu na dṛṣṭā niṣkṛtiḥ kvacit ||”

body.p:
śiviḥ, puṃ, hiṃsapaśuḥ | iti trikāṇḍaśeṣaḥ ||
bhūrjjavṛkṣaḥ | rājaviśeṣaḥ | sa ca uśīnararāja
puttraḥ | iti medinī || tasya caritraṃ yathā, ―

lg.l: “śṛṇu rājan! pravakṣyāmi svamāṃsaṃ śivinā yathā
samāṃśaṃ dattvavān_ satyaṃ purā hy auśīnaro yuvā ||
satyadānarataṃ jñātvā śivim indrāśuśukṣaṇī |
jijñāsārthaṃ sameyātāṃ varttamāne mahādhvare ||
vahnir bhūtvā kapotas tu hariśyenapuraḥsaraḥ |
śaraṇārtho mahīpālaṃ nininye bhayavihvalaḥ ||
trāhi māṃ pṛthivīpālety avadat_ śyenajād bhayāt |
sa tam āśvāsayāmāsa kapotaṃ śaraṇāgatam ||
rājānam upagamyātha śyenaḥ provāca saṃsadi |
vacanaṃ śṛṇu me rājan! kṣudhārttasya kuṭumbinaḥ ||
dharmmātmānaṃ tvām āhur vai pṛthivyāṃ sarvvapārthivāḥ |
tadviruddhaṃ kathaṃ karmma karttum icchasi pārthiva ||
sarvvasya sampadaḥ svārthāḥ svaparārthās tu kasyacit |
parārthā bhavato nityaṃ saphalasya taror iva ||
nopakārapare 'py evam upakāraparo janaḥ |
apakārapare 'pi tvam upakāraparaḥ sadā ||
mamaiva vihito dhātrā bhakṣyo 'yaṃ tvaṃ samut_sṛja |
sa śyenam āha saṃprāptas trāṇārtho sannidhā mama ||

tasmāt tavāhaṃ na samarpayiṣye
kapotakaṃ śyena yad atra yuktaṃ |

tvaṃ manyase tat_ karavāṇi sarvva
mṛte kapotāt_ khalu satyam atra ||
tubhyaṃ hi sumahad rājyaṃ prayacchāmi vihaṅgama |
yathā kāmayase cānyad varjjayitvā kapotakam ||
śyenaḥ prāha kim etat te prītir āsīt_ khage dṛḍhā |
kathaṃcid asya tulyāni svamāṃsāni prayaccha me ||
rājā tam abravīd dhṛṣṭo yan me māṃsāni yācase |
etad_ yacchāmi te sadyaḥ svamāṃsaṃ tulayā dhṛtam ||
evam uktā svamāṃsāni kapotena samaṃ nṛpaḥ |
ut_kṛtya tolayāmāsa prahṛṣṭo manasā tataḥ ||
tulayā dhriyamāṇas tu kapoto vyatiricyate |
punaś cot_kṛtya māṃsāni tataḥ prādāt_ sa pārthivaḥ
na vidyate yadā māṃsaṃ kapotena samaṃ kvacit |
tataḥ prakṣīṇamāṃso 'pi sādhuḥ sukhayate param ||
yadā tena na tulyaṃ tat_ sa tulām āruhat_ svayam |
antaḥpurastrīṣu na rājye na ca jīvite ||
karuṇāsaktacittena tenāpekṣā kṛtā kvacit |
paraduḥkhāturā nityaṃ svasukhāni mahanty api ||
nāpekṣante mahātmānaḥ sarvvabhūtahite ratāḥ |
parārtham udyatāḥ santaḥ santaḥ kiṃ kiṃ na kurvate ||
tādṛg apy ambudher vvāri jaladais tat_ prapīyate |
eka eva satāṃ mārgo yad aṅgīkṛtapālanam ||
dahantam akarot_ kroḍe pāvakaṃ yad apāṃ patiḥ |
ātmānaṃ pīḍayitvāpi sādhuḥ sukhayate param ||
hlādayan_ tāpitān_ vṛkṣo duḥkhañ ca sahate svayam
atha tasmin_ samārūḍhe puṣpavarṣaṃ papāta ca ||
tatas tasya tadā jñātvā vākyaṃ caitad abhāṣata ||
śakraḥ svarūpam āsthāya dharmme rājñaḥ paristhitim |
indro 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te kapoto havyavāhanaḥ ||
jijñāsamānau tvāṃ rājann imaṃ yajñam upāgatau |
mahākāruṇikeneha yat_ kṛtaṃ tat_ suduṣkaram ||
naiva pūrvve nṛpāś cakrunaṃ kariṣyanti cāpare |
yat te māṃsāni gātrebhyaḥ samut_kṛttāni pārthivaḥ ||
eṣā te śāśvatī kīrttir lokān anubhaviṣyati |
divyarūpadharaś caiva pālayitvā mahīṃ ciram ||
sarvvān_ lokān atikramya brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati |
eva muktvā tam indrāgnī jagmatus tridaśālayam |
rājā tu kratum iṣṭā taṃ mumude devatāṃ tadā ||”
“tyaktātmasukhabhogecchāḥ sarvvasattvasukhaiṣiṇaḥ |
bhavanti paraduḥkhena sādhavo nityaduḥkhitāḥ ||
paraduḥkhāturā nityaṃ svasukhāni mahānty api |
nāpekṣante mahātmānaḥ sarvvabhūtahite ratāḥ ||
parārtham udyatāḥ santaḥ santaḥ kiṃ kiṃ na kurvvate |
tādṛg apy ambudher vvāri jaladais tat_ prapīyate ||
eka eva satāṃ mārgo yad aṅgīkṛtapālanam |
dahantam akarot_ kroḍe pāvakaṃ yad apāṃ patiḥ ||
ātmānaṃ pīḍayitvāpi sādhuḥ sukhayate param |
hlādayann āśritān_ vṛkṣo duḥkhañ ca sahate svayam ||”

“tasmāt_ tvam api bhūpāla dehi nyāyārjjitaṃ
dhanam |

dānāt_ jñānaṃ tataḥ prāpya jñānāt_ siddhim
avāpsyasi ||”
